participant_1.name: Oliver Johnson
participant_1.personality: Passionate about music and sports, Oliver has a lively spirit and enjoys discussing various cultural topics.
participant_1.background: He grew up in a small town with a strong football culture, which influenced his love for football songs.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Curious and friendly, Emily has a keen interest in history and enjoys learning about the origins of things.
participant_2.background: Hailing from a diverse family, she has always been surrounded by different cultures and traditions, fostering her love for storytelling.

content.text: On The Ball, City, the oldest football song in the world.
